name: Waterfall (Lagache Louis, RemyDekor)
description:
Waterfall is a gamified experiment on the Charcot disease, a degenerative pathology that destroy motor skills.
Play as a person suffering from this disease, and deal with your reduced faculties for your last trip.

Credits :
Julie Marting
Solène Robinchon
Rémy Bonté Duval
Louis Lagache
